Hi there, our videos follow the Cambridge IGCSE Biology Paper 0610 syllabus. According to that, Drugs are covered in Chapter 15.   You might be following the Cambridge O Level Biology Syllabus for Paper 5090.  The syllabi for Cambridge O Level Biology (5090) and IGCSE Biology (0610) are similar but not identical.   To get a detailed comparison, please visit these links to compare the two syllabi:  Biology O Level 5090 Syllabus: https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/Images/595450-2023-2025-syllabus.pdf  Biology IGCSE 0610 Syllabus: https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/Images/595426-2023-2025-syllabus.pdf

Changes to this syllabus for 2023, 2024 and 2025 The syllabus has been reviewed and revised for first examination in 2023.  Sub-topics removed from the content: – 15.3 Misused drugs – 16.6 Methods of birth control in humans
In our textbooks there is no drugs chapter

Hi there, our videos follow the Cambridge IGCSE Biology Paper 0610 syllabus. According to that, Drugs are covered in Chapter 15.   You might be following the Cambridge O Level Biology Syllabus for Paper 5090.  The syllabi for Cambridge O Level Biology (5090) and IGCSE Biology (0610) are similar but not identical.   To get a detailed comparison, please visit these links to compare the two syllabi:  Biology O Level 5090 Syllabus: https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/Images/595450-2023-2025-syllabus.pdf  Biology IGCSE 0610 Syllabus: https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/Images/595426-2023-2025-syllabus.pdf
For the 2026 syllabus, it will be similar to the current one. However, if there are any updates or changes, we will make sure to update our channel accordingly. Stay tuned for the latest information!

Thank you for your feedback. We've noticed some comments about missing content in our videos. Just to clarify, our videos strictly adhere to the syllabus for Cambridge IGCSE Biology paper 0610. This information is clearly indicated in each video thumbnail and description.   If you feel any area is 'missing', please compare the syllabus of your specific paper against the one our videos follow.   You can find the syllabus booklet for IGCSE Biology Paper 0610 for the years 2023-2025 on the Cambridge International website:  https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/programmes-and-qualifications/cambridge-igcse-biology-0610/   For your convenience, you can also check your paper's syllabus here:   https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/programmes-and-qualifications/cambridge-upper-secondary/cambridge-igcse/subjects/#  Thank you for your understanding!
